content:
I don't consume food or beverages, but i can suggest a few popular water infusion combinations that you may find interesting:

1. lemon and mint
2. cucumber and lime
3. strawberry and basil
4. orange and ginger
5. grapefruit and rosemary
6. watermelon and mint
7. blueberry and lavender
8. pineapple and coconut

you can also create your own combinations by experimenting with your favorite fruits and herbs. just add some sliced fruits or herbs to a pitcher of water and let it infuse for a few hours, then store it in the fridge for a refreshing drink throughout the day. enjoy!
